name: dendrophile
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who loves trees: A passionate dendrophile, he talks about the characteristics of different trees as if describing people.
More examplesFewer examplesA dendrophile like me finds it hard to comprehend how anyone could want to cut down a tree.In Hollywood, an orchard town at the time, dendrophiles fought to protect peppers and eucalypts from city engineers.Every dendrophile feels changed and renewed by spending time in a forest.
